TopicTitle: For some reason, My game breaks when i dock and so i have to quick save 5 secs after docking. Any solutions?

Articles.Content: For some reason, My game breaks when i dock and so i have to quick save 5 secs after docking. Any solutions? I learned to dock, thanks the to wonderful people in this forum, But i dont know if this is a game problem or my own problem. but my game breaks when i dock and so i have to quick save 5 secs after docking.

Breaks how?

Crashes or what?

Anyhow, logs and a bit more info would help us to answer.
This is a support issue rather than a gameplay question, and so, moved. Good luck.
nevermind i fixed it i was going at the spacecraft 10 m/s and i had time control mod
